Did you use the BIRT all-in-one build? Which version?
Which external web server did you use? Tomcat 5.5? Or others.
Thanks.

(In reply to comment #1)
> Did you use the BIRT all-in-one build? Which version?

Just as you said, I am use the BIRT all-in-one build(2_2_0) and Tomcat 5.5.
Which version of your all-in-one build? Please give build id.

I have tested this build and can't reproduce this issue.
My env.
JDK 1.5.0_09,BIRT all-in-one build, tomcat 5.5.17
You can also check the 2.2 released build. Thanks.

I had two eclipse under the c:, The c:\eclipse is 3.2 and The c:\eclipse33 is 3.3(all-in-one build). Now I reinstalled the all-in-one build to the c:\eclipse and renamed the 3.2 to the c:\eclipse22. Then the problem never occurs. 
Thank u.
